Unnamed: 1: Fill in columns except for those labelled "(Do Not Modify)" - These should autofill
for name_id, see the instructor Payment Details Sheet
If session cancelled, input 1 for script_ignore, and note this in the Notes column
If 2 sessions on 1 day, make two lines - one for each session
If 2 instructors in 1 session, make two lines - one for each instructor
